column4: Hi, I was wondering, which release I need for Ubuntu on my P4 2.6GHz for desktop/gaming use?
You always download the newest relase (they come out every few months).... it's supported for 18 months or something... The most recent is Hoary Hedgehog (Ubuntu version 5.04)
well.. a new version is coming out in October.. and I think a new one comes out every 6 months... so 4 months old
